TopicTitle: I'm compiling a list of all texture packs

Articles.Content:
Glyph's List of Texture Packs

I'm compiling a list of all texture packs. It's still a work in progress - I've scoured the entire TextureReplacer thread, many reddit threads in /r/ksptexturepacks, and skimmed through many many other posts in an effort to catalogue every pack out there. Right now I'm focused on finding TextureReplacer, Environmental Visual Enhancements (EVE), and Universe Replacer (UR) textures.

A secondary goal is to bring awareness to the myriad Universe Replacer texture packs that were never converted to TextureReplacer. There are high quality textures hidden deep in the UR thread; it's sad that they aren't being downloaded much anymore, even though the textures can be used in TextureReplacer with a little effort.

Feedback is welcome, especially for omissions and errors in the list.

Edited June 16, 2014 by Glyph
I searched through Curse and the first 1400 posts of the EVE thread for textures. When I finish the EVE thread, the list will be essentially up-to-date.

I actually browsed through the whole UniverseReplacer thread several months ago picking out texture packs which I currently have mix-and-matched in TextureReplacer. Unfortunately, I didn't think to log my work. Clearly you are the better man. Thanks for the hard work.

I actually browsed through the whole UniverseReplacer thread several months ago picking out texture packs which I currently have mix-and-matched in TextureReplacer. Unfortunately, I didn't think to log my work. Clearly you are the better man. Thanks for the hard work.

Or the more obsessed man, anyway!

I still have (and use!) the Dreamscape skybox textures from ApatheticJester. I don't think I have the original download, though, so I'm not entirely certain how they're licensed.

E: Here's the forum thread for it, no license there either... Shame, I think it really needs to be shared.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/44913-0-21-1-UniverseReplacer-Dreamscape-Skybox-pack

Edited June 18, 2014 by regex

Here's the forum thread for it, no license there either... Shame, I think it really needs to be shared.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/44913-0-21-1-UniverseReplacer-Dreamscape-Skybox-pack

Gahd damnit.. because of course that d/l link would be broken, just my luck.. that's a beautiful skybox and with the power of 64bit, I might have even got a decent framerate with it installed. I can dream..

I bit the bullet and went through the last 2000 posts in the Eve thread. I think I only found one texture that I was missing, too :!. The list is now officially up to date with EVE, TextureReplacer, and TAC Fuel Balancer. I'm open to any suggestions for the list.

Glyph
